description: This file is the main front-end React component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing game state, user interactions, and rendering the UI.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component for the Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: handleMove
methods.description: Handles user's move on the game board.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game to initial state.

methods.name: onChangeMode
methods.description: Changes game mode and resets game.

methods.name: playerName
methods.description: Returns the display name ('Knight' or 'Queen') for a player token.

methods.name: playerIcon
methods.description: Returns the JSX for the player's icon image.
